mapper.sql: sid, userid, salaryid, date, datetype, attendance, attendance_salary, leavetype, leavesalary, workovertime, worksalary, evection, allowance, timesalary, task, tasksalary, busalary, trafficsalary, additionalsalary
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from yo_salary
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT sid, userid, salaryid, DATE, datetype, attendance, attendance_salary, leavetype, leavesalary, workovertime, worksalary, evection, allowance, timesalary, task, tasksalary, busalary, trafficsalary, additionalsalary,NAME FROM yo_salary yo_salary LEFT JOIN staff_info ON userid=staff_user_id
name like CONCAT('%','${name}','%' )
mapper.insert: insert into yo_salary (sid, userid, salaryid, date, datetype, attendance, attendance_salary, leavetype, leavesalary, workovertime, worksalary, evection, allowance, timesalary, task, tasksalary, busalary, trafficsalary, additionalsalary) values (#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salaryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{datetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attendance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attendanceSalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{leavetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leavesalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{workovertime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{worksalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{evection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{allowance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timesalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{task,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tasksalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{busalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{trafficsalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{additionalsalary,jdbcType=DOUBLE})
